text: the Elohim and Ra Confederacy knew this before orchestrating the Second Seeding, and they allowed it to occur as a way of assisting to purify the digressive genetic codes. The lower-vibrating genetic imprints would dissolve into the Unified Field of D-2, while the soul essences could re-evolve through the Fifth Races.
